TEXT.TITLE: U.S. CHAMBER SAYS STOCK DROP HAS RUN COURSE
TEXT.BODY: The U.S. Chamber of Commerce, in a statement, said the phenomenal sell-off in the stock market is very likely to have run its course. The chamber said "there is no justification for such a dramatic downward correction." While conceding that there is some justifiable concern about inflation, higher interest rates and a lower dollar, these uncertainties have been overcompensated for over recent weeks, the Chamber said. Reuter
